title: Justin Bieber takes a mean fall as he gets launched off his unicycle while practicing at home
text:
He's a newly married man to wife Hailey Bieber.

But Justin Bieber took a break from grown-up territory on Friday as he tried - and failed - to ride a unicycle while outside his Beverly Hills home.

The 25-year-old pop star wore a hot pink shirt with a smiley face from his line Drew, baggy khaki pants and white sneakers as he hit the pavement hard.

Oof! Justin Bieber took a break from grown-up territory on Friday as he tried riding a unicycle and subsequently fell off, hitting the ground

In addition to his Drew apparel, the Purpose singer also wore a couple of different hats including a denim dad hat and a red snapback.

Bieber's sighting comes a day after he gave fans a tease of his potential new music via Instagram Story.

The Sorry hitmaker shared several clips of a remix he recorded of Many Men, a 2003 song by 50 Cent.

Ride or die: The 25-year-old pop star wore a hot pink shirt with a smiley face from his line Drew, baggy khaki pants and white sneakers

Active: He also wore a couple of different hats including a denim dad hat and a red snapback

His remix included lyrics that referenced his struggle with depression, his wife Hailey as well as time he took off from music.

'Took a couple years off / Shed a couple tears, dawg / Messed up here and there / No fear here dawg,” he raps. “Got a wife, livin’ life, livin’ right, yeah, it’s tight / Gluten free, look at me / Who would’ve thought I’d be nice / When I rap I will slap on the beat / I attack with the heat / No strap, I defeat, no cap,' he rapped.

'My style is impeccable / My wife, yeah, I put her on a pedestal,' he went on.

Wiped out: Justin looked to be in mid-air at one point as he fell off the unicycle

Stealth: He broke his fall with his own foot, with his hat falling off

Ouch: His palms hit the pavement as he fell to the ground

Change agent: Justin switched into a red snapback at one point

'My life is like a movie, The Incredibles,' he said.

He then addressed the treatment he's getting for his depression in another line, saying: 'They put me on some medicine / Never thought that my depression would depend on it / I resented it.'

He continued: 'Going hard, running on adrenaline / Been a victim of the system, I’m a Christian with a vision, I’m a gentleman.'

Emcee: Bieber's sighting comes a day after he gave fans a tease of his potential new music via Instagram Story

The remix got many fans wondering if the rap would be part of Justin's new LP, but he insisted that the ditty was just for kicks.

'Not album stuff just messing around while Hailey’s doing something video stuff in the other room.. it is tight though,' he wrote as an Instagram Story caption.

Justin and Hailey were wed in a second religious ceremony on Sept. 30, a follow-up to their ceremony at a NYC courthouse on Sept. 13, 2018.

Meanwhile, Hailey was across the country in NYC sporting a vinyl snakeskin blazer and a lingerie-inspired dress.

She was seen chatting with and hugging pals before she drove off in a vehicle.



Socializing: Meanwhile, Hailey was across the country in NYC sporting a vinyl snakeskin blazer and a lingerie-inspired dress

Warm: She was seen chatting with and hugging pals before she drove off in a vehicle
description: He's a newly married man to wife Hailey Bieber. But Justin Bieber took a break from grown-up territory on Friday as he tried riding a unicycle and subsequently fell off, hitting the ground.
